title: Veil of Pearls
description: 1811 in the prosperous port city of Charleston bustles with immigrants, such as the raven-haired Adalia Winston. But Adalia is runaway slave Althea from Barbados. Skilled in herbal remedies, she finds employment with a local doctor and settles into a quiet life.Born into a prominent family, Morgan Rutledge is handsome, boredâ€”and falls for the beautiful Adalia, who spurns his advances. Morgan persists, however, and finally sweeps Adalia into glamorous high society. But Adalia's new life comes at a high price. How long can she deny her heritage and her God?
author: MaryLu Tyndall
